name: Shrimp Stuffed Mushrooms
author: Tony Anderson
summary: This is a wonderful dish that can be served with almost any main course. These mushrooms stuffed with shrimp and topped with melted Cheddar cheese go really will with Italian food. I love them!
ingredients: ½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Lightly grease a medium baking dish
Finely chop stems, and set aside
Arrange caps cavity side up in the baking dish
In a medium bowl, mix mushroom stems, cooked baby shrimp, crushed bacon flavored crackers and cream cheese
Stuff mushroom caps generously with the mushroom stem mixture
Bake in the preheated oven 8 to 10 minutes, or until cheese is melted and lightly browned
